channel.title: If you type what in the client you have yellow lines, I want change that. How?
channel.description: Change collor of the line what you say to green PLZ help! Instead of typing green: (what you say here).

item.title: If you type what in the client you have yellow lines, I want change that. How?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Search for:

if(s.startsWith("yellow:"))

Directly above that will be something similar to this:

int j2 = 0; int i3 = 0;

Replace that with:

int j2 = 2; int i3 = 0;

Save, compile & Run, and it should be working fine ;).

Read full topic
item.source: If you type what in the client you have yellow lines, I want change that. How?
